mapper.insert:
SELECT GAME_USERS_SEQ.nextval FROM dual
INSERT INTO GAME_USERS(no, game_no, user_no, rank, survival_time, regdate) VALUES (#{no},#{gameNo}, #{userNo}, #{rank}, #{survivalTime}, systimestamp)
mapper.select: SELECT u.no userNo, NVL(rankSum,0) rankSum, NVL(survivalTimeSum,0) survivalTimeSum, NVL(totalGame,0) totalGame, NVL(rank1Count,0) rank1Count FROM users u, (SELECT user_no, SUM(rank) rankSum, SUM(survival_time) survivalTimeSum, count(*) totalGame FROM game_users GROUP BY user_no) g, (SELECT user_no, count(*) rank1Count FROM game_users WHERE rank = '1' GROUP BY user_no) r WHERE g.user_no = r.user_no(+) AND u.no = g.user_no(+) AND u.no = #{userNo}
